com.microsoft.bing.speech

Class Conversation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.bing.speech.Conversation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataRecognitionClient, MicrophoneRecognitionClient

    public class Conversation
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for Conversational Understanding Sessions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Conversation() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void audioStart()
      The microphone is turned on and data from the microphone is sent to the Speech Recognition Service.
      void audioStop()
      The microphone is turned off and the connection to the Speech Recognition Server is severed.
      void finalize()
      Should only be called when client is ready to break the connection with the Speech Recognition Server.
      void PlayWaveFile(java.lang.String fileName)
      Plays a wave file.
      void StreamTTS(java.lang.String mimeType, java.lang.String input)
      Performs Text to Speech
      void TTSStop()
      Stop Text to Speech request in progress.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Conversation

        public Conversation()

    • Method Detail

      • audioStart

        public void audioStart()
        The microphone is turned on and data from the microphone is sent to the Speech Recognition Service. A built in Silence Detector is applied to the microphone data before it is sent to the recognition service.

      • audioStop

        public void audioStop()
        The microphone is turned off and the connection to the Speech Recognition Server is severed.

      • StreamTTS

        public void StreamTTS(java.lang.String mimeType,
             java.lang.String input)
        Performs Text to Speech
        Parameters:
        mimeType - The Mime Type. For SSML, use application/ssml+xml.
        input - The Text to spoken. If mime type is ssml, then input will be wrapped in SSML envelope.

      • TTSStop

        public void TTSStop()
        Stop Text to Speech request in progress.

      • PlayWaveFile

        public void PlayWaveFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Plays a wave file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file to play with path.

      • finalize

        public void finalize()
              throws java.lang.Throwable
        Should only be called when client is ready to break the connection with the Speech Recognition Server. For example, after the Speech Recognition Server returns the final speech recognition result.
        Overrides:
        finalize in class java.lang.Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable
